== HardwareSupport/Components/Multimedia/WebCameras ==

=== Webcameras ===

Webcams normally use the <nowiki>[[http://www.exploits.org/v4l/|video for linux (v4l)]]</nowiki> framework. The Ubuntu kernel has support for v4l compiled into it.

You may also need a driver for your camera. If it does not just work when you start e.g. xawtv, a good starting point to look for your camera is: http://www.qbik.ch/usb/devices/ (use the search field with your manufacturer name). Some nice people have also made an application to build the latest driver for some webcams: <nowiki>[[https://help.ubuntu.com/community/EasyCam|EasyCam]]</nowiki>. For more help see the <nowiki>[[https://help.ubuntu.com/community/Webcam|Webcam]]</nowiki> page.
